extendedInfo.description: ââNew DioDict 4, Quick Search Enabled Electronic Dictionary, Now AvailableââThe Official New Ace Korean-Japanese Dictionary â¢ Compiled jointly by Kumsung Publishing Korea and Shogakukan Publishing Japan â¢ One of the most comprehensive Japanese-Korean dictionaries available â¢ Contains over 211,313 headwords, expressions and translations â¢ Thousands of examples and grammar notes â¢ No internet connection needed.**Free upgrade available for DioDict 3 users. DioDict 4 is only compatible with OS versions ICS (Android 4.0) and above. If your deviceâs OS is ICS or higher, DioDict 4 will be downloaded and installed. If your deviceâs OS is lower than ICS, DioDict 3 will be automatically selected for download.If you are using DioDict 3, please note that each version has different functions. Wordbook/History functions may not be available in the newest version due to database replacement. ** ===== Dictionary features include=====â¢ DIOTEK's digital dictionary contents are based on the New Ace Japanese-Korean/Korean-Japanese dictionaries of Kumsung Publishing Co. Ltd., which is a specialty publisher with 45 years' experience. â¢ Includes 90,000 Japanese-Korean headwords, 120,000 Korean-Japanese headwords, and extensive new words that were carefully selected.â¢ two way Japanese-Korean dictionary suited to learners of both Japanese and Korean.â¢ Includes simple and accurate Korean equivalents of headwords, and extensive examples that can be easily applied. â¢ The Korean-Japanese dictionary was developed and published jointly with Shogakukan, which is a renowned Japanese publisher. â¢ Number 1 in terms of brand recognition and sales from amongst the Korean-Japanese dictionaries in Japan.â¢ Detailed grammatical explanations on verb endings, affixes, particles as well as tips on word usage.=====Powerful & Specialized Functions===== â¶ Easier Search with 'Multi Search' â â¢ When you enter a word to search, relevant sentence idioms and phrasal verbs are searched for. â¢ Multiple types of searches are available in a single search window without the need to select a search mode. â¶ Search Features â â¢ Wildcard search: enter â?â or â*â in place of a letter when you are unsure of the spelling (e.g., âman*verâ retrieves the word âmaneuverâ). â¢ Search not only for words, but for phrases or examples. â¢ DioDict provides a Japanese Handwriting Search mode.â¢ The search results are listed in real-time when you enter a keyword. â¢ Links to Google so that you can search for more information on a particular word. â¶ Vocab Revision â â¢ Pronunciation guide from the built-in Japanese/Korean Text To Speech (TTS) solution.â¢ History menu lists all your recent word searches. â¢ Save words and expressions to any number of flashcard folders. â¢ You can efficiently learn the words saved in the folders using the Cradle and Yes/No Quizzes function. ** A Japanese keyboard/input method is not included in our app. Free Japanese keyboard apps are available, however, on Google Play. We recommend using one of the following: Simeji, Go keyboard, Google Japanese Input **â  CS center : support@diotek.co.kr â  www.facebook.com/DIOTEK

reviews.comment: DioTTSService takes up 9MB of memory. Please move it on SD card.
reviews.author: A Google User
